name: Lightning Decision Jam (LDJ)
description:
The lightning decision jam was introduced to me by AJ&Smart a few years ago. It has served as a guide for strategy, a resolver of internal team conflict, and an excellent workshop for shaking up teams facing analysis paralysis.


The LDJ is a quiet workshop, meaning most of the time spent working on these items is spent silently alone. The workshop is designed to last under an hour, but I often find that I have to break a rule or two along the way to fit the teams' energy, or performance for that day. This usually results in a 1.5-hour-long workshop.


I can refine this over time but wanted to publish this template on figjam, so that others may enjoy the amazing outcomes of a workshop like LDJs. If you have any questions - just reach out!
